name: policy_exists_rls_disabled
title: Policy Exists RLS Disabled
description: Detects cases where row level security (RLS) policies have been created, but RLS has not been enabled for the underlying table.
detail: Table \`public.marketplace_accounts\` has RLS policies but RLS is not enabled on the table. Policies include {Allow_All_Authenticated_Operations,"Own Data Access Market"}.

name: policy_exists_rls_disabled
title: Policy Exists RLS Disabled
description: Detects cases where row level security (RLS) policies have been created, but RLS has not been enabled for the underlying table.
detail: Table \`public.products\` has RLS policies but RLS is not enabled on the table. Policies include {"Own Data Access Products"}.

name: rls_disabled_in_public
title: RLS Disabled in Public
description: Detects cases where row level security (RLS) has not been enabled on tables in schemas exposed to PostgREST
detail: Table \`public.marketplace_accounts\` is public, but RLS has not been enabled.

name: rls_disabled_in_public

detail: Table \`public.products\` is public, but RLS has not been enabled.
